name: Techno Fall
description:
Easy to learn, but hard to master.

Your mission is to make the ball fall down the gaps as far down as possible.
Steer the ball by tapping the blocks at the bottom of the screen.

To make the ball fall down through a gap, you have to match the correct bouncing block
(left or right) on both sides.

Three simple rules:
- Don't let the ball go the wrong way!
- Beat your high score!
- Have fun!


Play Techno Fall, play this addictive game now!
